import React, { useState } from 'react' // import ReactQuill from 'react-quill'; import 'react-quill/dist/quill.snow.css'; import axios from "axios" function Write() { const [value, setValue] = useState(''); const [title, setTitle] = useState(''); const [file, setFile] = useState(null); const [cat, setCat] = useState(''); const upload = async ()=>{ try{ const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("file", file); const res = await axios.post("/api/upload", formData); console.log(res.data); }catch(err){ console.log(err); } } const handleClick = async e=>{ e.preventDefault(); upload(); } return (
setTitle(e.target.value)}/>
